statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews
SELECT review_id, customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews
SELECT product_id, customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 12345;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC, review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews;
SELECT review_id, customer_name, review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, review_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_category FROM CustomerReviews JOIN ReviewAnalysis ON CustomerReviews.review_id = ReviewAnalysis.review_id;
SELECT customer_name, confidence_score FROM CustomerReviews JOIN ReviewAnalysis ON CustomerReviews.review_id = ReviewAnalysis.review_id WHERE confidence_score > 0.7 ORDER BY confidence_score ASC;
SELECT review_id, customer_name, review_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews
SELECT review_id, customer_name, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT customer_name, review_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT review_id, sentiment_category, confidence_score FROM ReviewAnalysis
SELECT review_id, sentiment_category, confidence_score FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE confidence_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_category
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT sentiment_name, sentiment_value FROM customer_sentiments ORDER BY sentiment_value DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_text, sentiment_name FROM customer_reviews JOIN customer_sentiments ON customer_reviews.sentiment_score = customer_sentiments.sentiment_value;
SELECT * FROM review_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC, sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT review_text, sentiment_name FROM customer_reviews JOIN review_analysis ON customer_reviews.review_id = review_analysis.review_id JOIN customer_sentiments ON review_analysis.sentiment_id = customer_sentiments.sentiment_id
SELECT review_id, sentiment_name, analysis_date FROM review_analysis RA JOIN customer_sentiments CS ON RA.sentiment_id = CS.sentiment_id WHERE RA.analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT sentiment_name, AVG(sentiment_value) AS avg_sentiment_value FROM customer_sentiments GROUP BY sentiment_name HAVING AVG(sentiment_value) > 0.5
SELECT sentiment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM customer_sentiments CS JOIN review_analysis RA ON CS.sentiment_id = RA.sentiment_id GROUP BY sentiment_name ORDER BY total_reviews DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM CustomerReviews WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_id = 3;
SELECT tag_name FROM ReviewTags WHERE review_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM SentimentScores WHERE positive_score > 0.5 AND negative_score < 0.3;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_label FROM CustomerReviews JOIN SentimentScores ON CustomerReviews.review_id = SentimentScores.review_id;
SELECT review_text, tag_name FROM CustomerReviews JOIN ReviewTags ON CustomerReviews.review_id = ReviewTags.review_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id;
SELECT review_id, sentiment_score FROM reviews_sentiment_scores ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT review_text, customer_name FROM customer_reviews JOIN customers ON customer_reviews.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_reviews ON customers.customer_id = customer_reviews.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name

SELECT product_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM products JOIN review_product_mapping ON products.product_id = review_product_mapping.product_id JOIN reviews_sentiment_scores ON review_product_mapping.review_id = reviews_sentiment_scores.review_id GROUP BY products.product_name
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews JOIN reviews_sentiment_scores ON customer_reviews.review_id = reviews_sentiment_scores.review_id WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3
